To quote PlayStation console architect Mark Cerny in a recent AMD video, next-gen is just a few years away. And it seems the target consistent with past console release cycles is 2027.

articles.author: Leah Stodart
articles.title: Amazon October Prime Day TV deals: 75-inch QLED for $399.99 and more - Mashable
articles.description: Compared to the Prime Day deals we saw in July, Amazon is easily out-pricing itself with some cheap QLEDs.
